collections.title: Free e-books download
collections.description: EpubKit is a tool that packages web pages into e-books. Here are some selected resources that I personally think are worth reading. They are all packaged into ePub format e-books using EpubKit and can be read on devices such as Kindle, iPad and Kobo
collections.disclaimer: All generated e-books are publicly released by the original authors, and the copyright belongs to the original authors. This site does not charge any fees for this.
collections.book_download_description: Download free "{{title}}" ebook by {{author}}, read on Kindle, iPad, Kobo. No sign-up required.

words.slogan: The best tool to convert web to ebook
words.description: Save web pages, Online books, and RSS articles as e-books

features.title: Webpage to eBook
features.description: Merge and save one or more URLs, export as ePub eBook

features.title: Save All Links from a Website with One Click
features.description: Want to read your favorite blogs on Kindle? Select all links within the site in bulk and save as eBook

features.title: RSS to eBook
features.description: Get articles from your favorite RSS feeds and select in bulk to save as eBook

features.title: Save Web Pages in Browser
features.description: Install browser plugin to save the current browsing webpage

qna.q: Can EpubKit save content that requires login?
qna.a: You can use the browser plugin to save the page content you see after logging in. Or log in first using the 'Browser' feature in the EpubKit software and then import the link.

qna.q: Will my content be uploaded to the server?
qna.a: No. All content processing is done on your device, and the content does not pass through any server.

pricing.title: Free
features: Export up to 10 pages per eBook

pricing.title: Pro
features: More Pro-only features in the future
